name: Oud Royale
description: A sophisticated blend of rare oud wood, amber, and dark spices. This opulent fragrance embodies timeless luxury with warm, resinous notes that linger throughout the day.

name: Velvet Rose
description: An elegant bouquet of Turkish rose, jasmine sambac, and white musk. Delicate yet captivating, this feminine scent evokes the romance of Parisian gardens in spring.

name: Mystic Amber
description: A mesmerizing oriental fragrance featuring rich amber, sandalwood, and vanilla. Warm and sensual, perfect for evening wear with exceptional longevity.

name: Ocean Breeze
description: Fresh aquatic notes combined with bergamot, sea salt, and driftwood. A crisp, clean fragrance that captures the essence of Mediterranean shores.

name: Leather & Tobacco
description: Bold and masculine with notes of Italian leather, dark tobacco, and cedarwood. A distinguished fragrance for the modern gentleman with refined taste.

name: Citrus Garden
description: Vibrant blend of Sicilian lemon, grapefruit, and neroli with a base of white tea. Refreshing and uplifting, perfect for daytime wear in any season.
